mapper.select:
SELECT supplier_id as supplierId, supplier_coding as supplierCoding, supplier_name as supplierName, supplier_type as supplierType, supplier_linkman as supplierLinkman, supplier_phone as supplierPhone, supplier_contract as supplierContract, supplier_shop as supplierShop, supplier_use as supplierUse supplier_abbreviation as supplierAbbreviation
FROM smscke_supplier WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY supplier_coding ASC
